mapper.select: select reportNum, reportContext, reportPath, CASE reportType when '1' then '부적절한 홍보 게시물' when '2' then '폭언, 욕설 사용' when '3' then '저작권 침해' else '폭언, 욕설 사용' end as reportType , reportDate, reportResultDate, reporter, defendant, reportResult from report where reportNum=#{reportNum}
mapper.update: update report set reportResult = '처리완료', reportResultDate = sysdate where reportNum=#{reportNum}
mapper.select: select senderUname, toUname,chatContext,mCheck,sendDate from chat where senderUname in (#{reporter},#{defendant}) and toUname in (#{defendant},#{reporter})
